name: Abactor
effect:
+1 stealth hunt action.

Gain 5 blood. After successful resolution, a referendum is called to call a blood hunt on this vampire (independent of the action, just as if he or she had committed diablerie).

name: Alan Sovereign
effect:
Advanced, Camarilla: while Alan is ready, you may pay some or all of the pool cost of equipping from any investment cards you control.

[MERGED] During your master phase, if Alan is ready, you may move a counter from any investment card to your pool.

name: Angelo
effect: Independent, Red List: All Blood Brothers may play cards that require Sanguinus as if Angelo were a member of any circle. Angelo can burn a location as a (D) Action. He cannot have or use retainers. Sterile.

name: Anthelios, The Red Star
effect:
Gehenna.
Once each master phase, a Methuselah can use a master phase action to exchange a master card in his or her hand for one in his or her ash heap.

name: Argent Baton
effect:
Unique melee weapon.


Strike: strength+1 damage. If the opposing minion is a werewolf, the bearer can make a ranged strike to burn 4 life from that werewolf.

name: Barbaro Lucchese
effect: Independent: Barbaro may place a taint counter on a minion as a (D) action. If a minion has 2 taint counters, burn those counters to make the minion infernal. Barbaro may change his clan to Tremere antitribu as +1 stealth action. Infernal.

name: Botched Move
effect:
Only usable as the opposing minion plays a card that requires a Discipline.


The opposing minion's controller reveals the top two cards of his or her library (before drawing to replace). If another copy of the same combat card is revealed, the played card is canceled (cost is still paid), the opposing minion takes 1 unpreventable damage, and all revealed copies are burned. A minion may play only one Botched Move each combat.

name: Call the Wild Hunt
effect:
Only usable before range is determined.

[ani][pro] For the remainder of combat, this vampire is immune to frenzy cards. A vampire may play only one Call the Wild Hunt each combat.

[ANI][PRO] As above, and during the initial strike resolution phase of this round, you may burn X animals from your hand to inflict X ranged damage on the opposing minion.

name: Claudio Severino
effect: Camarilla: Combat cards cost an opposing vampire an additional blood. During your untap phase, burn 1 pool if there are no Gehenna cards in play.

name: Cloak of the Abalone
effect:
Unique equipment.

Toreador and Toreador antitribu cannot block this minion.

name: Codex of the Edenic Groundskeepers
effect:
Unique equipment.
This minion gets -2 stealth when bleeding. This minion may bleed as a (D) action that costs 1 blood; this action gets +3 bleed if the target Methuselah doesn't control a ready untapped minion.

name: Convergence
effect:
Master.

Move 1 blood from each ready Pander you control to a Pander in your uncontrolled region.

name: Crematorium
effect:
Master: unique location.


Tap during your untap phase to burn a vampire in torpor with no blood.

name: Crusade: Aragon
effect:
Requires a Sabbat vampire. Title.
If this referendum passes, put this card on the acting vampire to represent the unique Sabbat title of Archbishop of Aragon. If Lucita is in play and is Sabbat, put this card on her instead.

name: Dan Murdock
effect: Camarilla: Dan may take an action to allow you to go though your library, find Giant's Blood, and take it into your hand. Reshuffle afterwards and discard to your maximum hand size.

name: Duality
effect:
Sabbat:



When Duality plays a card that requires Vicissitude, you may draw an additional card.

name: Echo
effect: Camarilla: Echo gets +1 strength in combat with a Red List minion.

name: Ensemble
effect:
After playing this card, you cannot play another action modifier to further increase the bleed for this action.


+X bleed, where X is the number of ready untapped Daughters of Cacophony you control. Tap all ready Daughters of Cacophony you control.

name: Eye of Hazimel
effect:
Unique equipment.
The minion with this equipment gets +1 bleed and +1 strength. This minion may enter combat with any minion controlled by another Methuselah as a (D) action. If this minion is a vampire, he or she has superior Potence [POT] and superior Chimerstry [CHI], and combat cards cost this vampire 1 less blood to play. While the bearer is ready, this equipment cannot be transferred, moved or stolen. If this equipment is burned, this minion takes 5 unpreventable damage. During your untap phase, burn 1 pool or burn this equipment.

name: Fatima al-Faqadi
effect: Independent: Once per combat, before range is determined, Fatima may equip with a weapon from your hand. Pay the cost to equip as normal. (Blood Cursed)

name: Flames of Insurrection
effect:
Unique master. Requires a ready anarch.

When a minion opposing an anarch in combat leaves the ready region, the controller of that anarch may move a counter from the bank to a vampire in his or her uncontrolled region. Any vampire may call a referendum to burn this card as a +1 stealth political action.

name: Genina, the Red Poet
effect: Independent, Red List: If a blood hunt is successfully called on Genina, she goes to torpor instead of being burned. Genina gets +1 stealth on diablerie actions and on undirected actions.
attributes: • Disciplines: THN OBF CHI for cel aus

name: Gran Madre di Dio, Italy
effect:
In play, this is a unique location and does not count as equipment


When your predator or prey puts a minion in play in any phase except the untap phase, that minion is tapped. If that minion is a younger vampire, he or she burns 1 blood.

name: Guide and Mentor
effect:
Master.
Put this card in play. A vampire you control may search your library for a master: archetype and move 1 blood from the bank and that card to himself or herself as a +1 stealth action that costs X pool where X is the number of copies of that card on minions you control (requirements and cost apply as normal).

name: Hannibal
effect:
Group 2
Advanced, Sabbat cardinal:


Once during each Methuselah's minion phase, Hannibal may burn 2 blood to untap.

name: Helena
effect:
Advanced, Independent: Helena pays no blood cost for reaction cards that require Auspex or Dominate. Infernal.

[MERGED] Helena is immune to damage from demons and gains 1 level of Daimoinon and Obtenebration.
attributes: • Disciplines: DOM CEL AUS tha pre obf dai

name: Hesha Ruhadze
effect: Independent: When hunting, Hesha gets an additional +1 stealth and gains an additional blood if successful.

name: House of Sorrow
effect:
Master: unique location.

Tap to untap any card you control that is not a minion. If you do so, neither that card nor this location untap as normal on your next untap phase.

name: Imperator
effect:
{Title.}

Choose a Camarilla vampire with capacity 8 or more. If this referendum is successful, put this card on the chosen vampire to represent the unique Camarilla title of Imperator (worth 3 votes). This vampire may play a Blood Hunt card from your hand or ash heap as a prince. This vampire gets 3 additional votes in blood hunt referendums.

name: Inceptor
effect:
Unique master.

Put this card on a vampire of capacity 1, and put three cards from your hand, ash heap or library on this card, face up but out of play. This vampire may play other copies of these cards as if he or she had the Discipline required (if any) at superior.

name: Infamous Insurgent
effect: Unique master. Put this card on a Red List anarch vampire. This vampire is infernal, Bahari, and gets 2 additional votes. During this vampire's minion phase, his or her controller may untap a ready anarch he or she controls.

name: Jessica
effect:
Group 2
Advanced, Sabbat bishop: Jessica gets +1 stealth on political actions.
[MERGED ICON] Archbishop of Brussels.

name: Karsh
effect:
Camarilla: Karsh may play a Blood Hunt card from your hand or ash heap as a prince. He gets 3 additional votes in blood hunt referendums. He cannot block infernal vampires.

[MERGED] Imperator (3 votes): +1 intercept

name: Kaymakli Fragment
effect:
Unique equipment.




This Sabbat vampire may allow you to draw 5 cards from your library as an action (discard afterward). This infernal minion may move 3 blood from the bank to a vampire in your uncontrolled region as a +1 stealth action. Any minion may steal this equipment as a strike.

name: Kestrelle Hayes
effect: Sabbat. Black Hand: Kestrelle gets +1 stealth on (D) actions directed at a Methuselah who doesn't control a ready Sabbat vampire.

name: Kisha Bhimji
effect:
Laibon magaji:


Kisha gets -1 stealth on non-hunt actions.

name: Lambach
effect:
Advanced, Independent: Lambach has 2 votes. He can equip with an Eye of Hazimel at no cost from your library as a +1 stealth action (shuffle afterward).
[MERGED ICON] He untaps when he successfully performs an action to put a vampire in play.

name: Lay Low
effect:
Requires an anarch.

Only usable when a blood hunt referendum passes and would burn this anarch. Move this anarch to the uncontrolled region (breaking any temporary control effects). Any cards and counters on this vampire remain with him or her (but are out of play as long as the vampire remains uncontrolled).

name: Legion
effect:
Requires a ready vampire with capacity above 7. +1 stealth action.
Put this card on this acting vampire. This non-Sterile vampire can put a Master Discipline card from your hand or ash heap in play to represent a fledgling with 1 level of that discipline and discard the rest of your hand as a +2 stealth action. The fledgling is a 1-capacity, non-unique vampire of the same clan as this vampire. The fledgling cannot act or block or play cards if this vampire is not ready.

name: Lilith's Blessing
effect:
Master.
Put this card in play. As a master phase action, you may tap this card to search your library for a master: Discipline card and choose a ready non-Bahari vampire you control who has no blood. That vampire gains the Discipline card (if any) and 3 blood and becomes Bahari.

name: Lucita
effect: Independent: Sabbat vampires younger than Lucita get -1 intercept when attempting to block Lucita.

name: Marcus Vitel
effect: Camarilla Prince of Washington, D.C.: Marcus can burn a retainer as a +1 stealth (D) action. While Marcus is ready and a prince, Sabbat vampires you control get +1 bleed when bleeding a Methuselah who controls a ready Camarilla vampire.

name: Mariana Gilbert
effect: Camarilla

name: Menele
effect:
Independent: If Helena is ready, minion cards cost Menele 1 less blood.
[MERGED] Menele may steal 2 blood as a strike.

name: Nergal
effect: Independent: Once each turn, Nergal may reduce the cost of a card he plays by one blood. +2 bleed. Infernal.
attributes: • Disciplines: AUS DAI FOR OBF PRE THA

name: Nergal
effect: Independent: Reaction cards cost an additional blood when Nergal is acting. Once each action, Nergal may burn 1 blood to get +1 stealth. Infernal.
attributes: • Disciplines: AUS DAI FOR OBF PRE THA

name: Path of the Void
effect:
Unique master. Path.


Put this card on a vampire you control. This vampire gets +1 stealth, -1 bleed, and can inflict 1 damage on any minion as a (D) action. During this vampire's untap phase, his or her controller must discard a master card or tap this vampire. Burn this card if this vampire commits diablerie. A vampire can have only one path.

name: Port Authority
effect:
Government.
When a Methuselah uses a discard phase action to discard a card, he or she doesn't draw to replace that card until his or her next untap phase.

name: Prophecies of Gehenna
effect:
Unique master.
Put this card in play. During your master phase, you may tap this card to look at your prey's hand. If you do so, your prey takes control of the Prophecies of Gehenna. Any Methuselah may burn this card during his or her untap phase by revealing his or her hand to all players.

name: Public Enemy
effect:
+1 stealth action. Requires a non-Red List, non-anarch vampire.

(D) Choose a non-titled, non-Red List minion who either has successfully bled for 3 or more pool since your last turn or is infernal or anarch. The chosen minion becomes Red List.

name: Reliquary: Shango Remains
effect:
Equipment.


Choose an Assamite in your ash heap or burn 1 pool to choose an Assamite in your uncontrolled region. Remove that Assamite from the game or burn this reliquary. Once per turn, if this Assamite is ready, he or she may burn 1 blood to give you +2 hand size for the remainder of the turn; this ability cannot be used during combat.

name: Retribution
effect:
Master.
Choose a minion who successfully bled you for more than 1 pool since your last turn. The chosen minion takes 3 unpreventable damage. A Methuselah can play only 1 Retribution in a game.

name: Reverend Adams
effect:
Independent:


Reverend Adams gets -1 stealth on political actions. Older vampires do not tap for successfully blocking Reverend Adams.

name: Rogue
effect:
Master: trifle

Play on a vampire who has committed diablerie since your last turn. Any vampire can enter combat with this vampire as a (D) action. Vampires with Auspex get +1 stealth on that action.

name: Rubicon
effect:
+1 stealth action. Requires a titled vampire.
(D) Burn a younger non-titled vampire who has burned one of your non-Red list vampires since your last turn.

name: Salt of Thoth
effect: Usable by a tapped Tremere. Cause a (D) action targeting a location you control to fail and put this card on that location. You may burn this card to cause a (D) action targeting this location to fail.

name: Sascha Vykos, The Angel of Caine
effect: Sabbat Priscus: When a vampire opposing Sascha in combat goes to torpor, you may choose to increase your hand size by 2 for the remainder of the turn. This ability can be used only once per turn.

name: SchreckNET
effect:
+1 stealth. Unique.

If this Nosferatu's capacity is 6 or more, he or she untaps. Put this card in play. Whenever a referendum succeeds, you may tap this card to look at any Methuselah's hand.

name: Selena
effect: Sabbat. Black Hand: Damage inflicted on Selena by a werewolf is aggravated.

name: Sound of a Breaking Oath
effect:
[aus][dom] [ACTION] +1 stealth action. Put this card on a minion you control. If an action to steal the minion with this card is successful, this minion is burned instead and the acting minion takes 1 unpreventable damage.


[AUS][DOM] [REACTION] As above, but play when an action to steal a minion you control is successful.

name: Spontaneous Power
effect:
Unique master.

Put this card on a vampire and choose a Discipline. This vampire gains 1 level of the chosen Discipline. While in play, this card counts as a master: Discipline card.

name: Subdued by the Blood
effect:
Master: out-of-turn. Trifle.

Play when a vampire diablerizes a vampire of more than twice his or her capacity (before the blood hunt referendum, if any). Usable on your own turn. Move the victim from the ash heap to his or her owner's ready region, and move all blood from the diablerist to him or her. Remove the diablerist from the game.

name: The Baron
effect: Independent: The Baron has two votes. During your untap phase, if The Baron is ready, you may look at the hand of each Methuselah who controls a ready Giovanni. +1 bleed

name: The Erciyes Fragments
effect:
Unique master.
Put this card in play. Tap this card to move a library card from your prey's ash heap to this card, face down. You may look at that card at any time. You may play the card from the Fragments as if playing it from your hand (requirements and cost, if any, apply as normal). When that card is burned, remove it from the game instead. Only 1 card can be on this card at a time. Any vampire with a capacity above 4 can steal the Fragments (and any card on it) for his or her controller as a (D) action.

name: The Fourth Cycle
effect:
Requires at least two other Gehenna cards in play.
When this card is played, burn all Gehenna cards and conviction cards, and send all vampires with capacity 3 or less in torpor. No Gehenna cards may be played while this card remains in play.

name: The Marrakesh Codex
effect:
Unique Master

Tap to look at and reorder the top 4 cards of your library. Any vampire may steal this card for his or her controller as a (D) action.

name: The Meddling of Semsith
effect:
Political Action - Worth 1 Vote. Called by any vampire at +1 stealth.

Choose another Methuselah. If this referendum is successful, put this card in play. Your hand size is one card smaller. The chosen Methuselah doesn't draw to replace cards during any Methuselah's minion phase. After each minion phase, he or she draws back up to his or her hand size. Any vampire may call a referendum to burn this card as a +1 stealth political action

name: Treaty of Laibach
effect:
Unique master. Requires both Follower of Set and Tremere.



Put this card in play. Each Follower of Set is considered to have a level of Thaumaturgy [tha] equal to his or her level of Serpentis [ser]. Each Tremere is considered to have a level of Serpentis equal to his or her level of Thaumaturgy.

name: Two Wrongs
effect:
Master: out-of-turn. Trifle.

Play when a minion controlled by a Methuselah other than your predator is bleeding you. That minion is now bleeding his or her prey. The next card that would change the target of this bleed is canceled as it is played.

name: Victor Pelletier
effect:
Camarilla:


When Victor enters play, you may pay 1 pool to make him a primogen, 2 pool to make him Prince of Paris, or 3 pool to make him Ventrue Justicar. If Victor's title would be contested, he immediately yields instead of contesting.

name: Walks-With-Might
effect:
Unique werewolf with 4 life. 0 bleed, 3 strength.


Master cards cost you an additional pool. Walks-With-Might gets +1 intercept against Followers of Set. Each strike or damaging effect made against him inflicts 1 less damage on him.

name: Wall Street Night, Financial Newspaper
effect:
Master: unique location.




Tap during an undirected action to give a minion you control +1 intercept for the current action. Tap to select a minion you control. Once this turn, the chosen minion may move a counter from an investment card controlled by any Methuselah to your pool as a +1 stealth (D) action.

name: Waxen Poetica
effect:
Unique weapon.



Strike: 2R aggravated damage. Not usable against a vampire with Celerity [cel], an ally, or a retainer. Burn after use.

name: White Lily
effect:
Sabbat. Black Hand:


Once per combat, before range is determined, White Lily may equip with a weapon from your hand. (Pay cost as normal.)

name: Wind Dance
effect:
[tha] Strike: dodge
[THA] Strike: dodge with an additional strike: dodge this round.

name: Xaviar
effect: Independent: Xaviar has 2 votes. He can prevent 1 damage each combat. Once each combat, before range is determined, he may burn 2 blood to get +2 strength for the remainder of combat.
attributes: • Disciplines: aus cel pot ANI FOR PRO

name: Yazid Tamari
effect:
Sabbat. Black Hand: Yazid gets +1 stealth on (D) actions.
[MERGED] Independent. Anarch.

name: Yong-Sun, Harmonist
effect: Sabbat cardinal: Yong-Sun may burn the top card of your prey's crypt as a (D) action.
